72145acc-5beb-4912-9879-d7d207369b5a.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated a commitment to establishing themselves as a Colonial Life PPO Dental Subject Matter Expert. 39b987d7-14ae-4fae-88ea-0b2690b8a54b.description: The Champion program is comprised of the top District General Agents across Colonial Life who are recognized as innovative market and thought leaders. Champion members have a significant impact on Colonial Life’s success as they continue to drive new rep sales, cases, new recruits, broker sales, new direct sales, existing sales, and rework. These managers demonstrate their leadership by focusing on the Colonial Life brand and being exceptional sales drivers.
